item.title: Review of R Package uscovid
item.description: Introduction This blog post will be a review of the R package called uscovid with a pkgdown website here, created by Aarathy Babu.

item.title: Self-review of my Shiny app on COVID-19
item.description: This blog post will be a self-review of the shiny app on COVID-19 overview that I previously made which can be found here.

item.title: State of COVID-19 Cases in Egypt
item.description: COVID-19 pandemic has been declared as a Public Health Emergency of International Concern by the World Health Organisation.

item.title: State of COVID-19 Cases in Spain
item.description: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) has been a major issue since the virus spread worldwide from China’s Hubei Province, and it is affecting life.
